```{r}
# Question 1
n_dims <- sample(3:10, 1)
n_dims

seq(from=1, to=n_dims^2)
n_dims2 <- seq(from=1, to=n_dims^2)
n_dims2

sample(n_dims^2)
shuffled <- sample(n_dims^2)

mat <- matrix(data=shuffled, nrow = n_dims, ncol=n_dims)
print(mat)

t_mat <- t(mat)
print(t_mat)
```
